context: I broke a promise to spend time together
letters:
Dear Mom,

I hope this note finds you well. I’ve been thinking about our plans, and I can’t express how truly sorry I am for breaking my promise to spend time together. I know how much our time means to you, and it breaks my heart that I let you down.

I want you to know that it was never my intention to hurt you. Life got in the way, and I lost sight of what truly matters—the moments we share together. You deserve my time and attention, and I regret not prioritizing those precious moments with you.

Please forgive me for my thoughtlessness. It’s important to me that you know how much I value our relationship and the time we have as mother and child. I’m committed to making it up to you and ensuring this doesn’t happen again.

I would love to reschedule our time together soon, whenever it works for you. Let’s create some new memories that we can cherish.

Thank you for your understanding and patience. I love you more than words can express.

With all my love,  
[Your Name]
